languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g} уберег!" {n}— уверенно отвечает солдат.{/n} "Не думайте — я не бежал, Ваша Светлость! Оставался с командиром до конца. Застрелил последнего мятежника из той группы, что на нас напала. Но увы... командир от ранений скончался, остальные к тому времени были мертвы. Храни Император их души!"

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g} уберег!" {n}— уверенно отвечает солдат.{/n} "Не думайте — я не бежал, Ваша Светлость! Оставался с командиром до конца. Застрелил последнего мятежника из той группы, что на нас напала. Но увы... командир от ранений скончался, остальные к тому времени были мертвы. Храни Император их души!"

languages.text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protected me!" {n}the soldier replies with confidence.{/n} "I didn't run, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, if that's what you're thinking! I was by my commander's side until the very end. I shot the last rebel from the gang that attacked us. But alas... the captain succumbed to his wounds, and the others had already died. The Emperor rest their souls!"
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g} уберег!" {n}— уверенно отвечает солдат.{/n} "Не думайте — я не бежал, Ваша Светлость! Оставался с командиром до конца. I was by my commander's side until the very end. I shot the last rebel from the gang that attacked us. But alas... the captain succumbed to his wounds, and the others had already died. The Emperor rest their souls!"

languages.text: "Der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} hat mich beschützt!"{n}, antwortet der Soldat voller Überzeugung.{/n} "Ich bin nicht geflohen, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft, falls Ihr das glaubt! Ich stand bis zum Ende an der Seite meines Kommandanten. Ich habe den letzten Rebellen der Bande erschossen, die uns angegriffen hatte. Aber leider ... ist der Captain seinen Wunden erlegen, und die anderen waren schon gestorben. Möge der Imperator ihre Seelen in Frieden ruhen lassen!"
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protected me!" {n}the soldier replies with confidence.{/n} "I didn't run, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, if that's what you're thinking! I was by my commander's side until the very end. I shot the last rebel from the gang that attacked us. But alas... the captain succumbed to his wounds, and the others had already died. The Emperor rest their souls!"

traits.locale_text: "Der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} hat mich beschützt!"{n}, antwortet der Soldat voller Überzeugung.{/n} "Ich bin nicht geflohen, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft, falls Ihr das glaubt! Ich stand bis zum Ende an der Seite meines Kommandanten. Ich habe den letzten Rebellen der Bande erschossen, die uns angegriffen hatte. Aber leider ... ist der Captain seinen Wunden erlegen, und die anderen waren schon gestorben. Möge der Imperator ihre Seelen in Frieden ruhen lassen!"

languages.text: « L'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} m'a protégé ! {n}répond le soldat sûr de lui.{/n} Je ne me suis pas enfui, Votre Seigneurie, si c'est ce que vous pensez ! Je suis resté près de mon commandant jusqu'au bout. J'ai abattu le dernier rebelle de la bande qui nous a attaqués, mais hélas... le capitaine a succombé à ses blessures, et les autres étaient déjà morts. Que l'Empereur accueille leurs âmes ! »
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protected me!" {n}the soldier replies with confidence.{/n} "I didn't run, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, if that's what you're thinking! I was by my commander's side until the very end. I shot the last rebel from the gang that attacked us. But alas... the captain succumbed to his wounds, and the others had already died. The Emperor rest their souls!"

traits.locale_text: « L'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} m'a protégé ! {n}répond le soldat sûr de lui.{/n} Je ne me suis pas enfui, Votre Seigneurie, si c'est ce que vous pensez ! Je suis resté près de mon commandant jusqu'au bout. J'ai abattu le dernier rebelle de la bande qui nous a attaqués, mais hélas... le capitaine a succombé à ses blessures, et les autres étaient déjà morts. Que l'Empereur accueille leurs âmes ! »

languages.text: “是{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}保护了我！”{n}这个士兵自信地回答道。{/n}“如果您在怀疑我是不是临阵脱逃，我当然没有逃跑，大人！我一直在指挥官身边战斗，直到最后一刻。我击毙了袭击小队的最后一名敌人。可遗憾的是……队长伤重不治，其他人也都死了。愿帝皇能让他们的灵魂安息。”
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protected me!" {n}the soldier replies with confidence.{/n} "I didn't run, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, if that's what you're thinking! I was by my commander's side until the very end. I shot the last rebel from the gang that attacked us. But alas... the captain succumbed to his wounds, and the others had already died. The Emperor rest their souls!"

traits.locale_text: “是{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}保护了我！”{n}这个士兵自信地回答道。{/n}“如果您在怀疑我是不是临阵脱逃，我当然没有逃跑，大人！我一直在指挥官身边战斗，直到最后一刻。我击毙了袭击小队的最后一名敌人。可遗憾的是……队长伤重不治，其他人也都死了。愿帝皇能让他们的灵魂安息。”

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}がお守りくださったのです！」{n}兵士は自信を持って答えた。{/n}「私は逃げませんでした、陛下。もしそう思っているのであれば！最後まで私は司令のそばにいて、私たちを襲った一味の最後の反乱者を撃ちました。しかし…残念なことに中隊長は傷がもとで倒れ、他の者たちは既に死んでいました。皇帝よ、彼らの魂に安らぎが訪れんことを！」
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protected me!" {n}the soldier replies with confidence.{/n} "I didn't run, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, if that's what you're thinking! I was by my commander's side until the very end. I shot the last rebel from the gang that attacked us. But alas... the captain succumbed to his wounds, and the others had already died. The Emperor rest their souls!"

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}がお守りくださったのです！」{n}兵士は自信を持って答えた。{/n}「私は逃げませんでした、{mf|陛下|陛下}。もしそう思っているのであれば！最後まで私は司令のそばにいて、私たちを襲った一味の最後の反乱者を撃ちました。しかし…残念なことに中隊長は傷がもとで倒れ、他の者たちは既に死んでいました。皇帝よ、彼らの魂に安らぎが訪れんことを！」

languages.text: «¡El {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} me protegió!» {n}responde el soldado con confianza.{/n} «¡No huí, mi{mf|lord|lady}, si eso es lo que está pensando! Estuve junto a mi comandante hasta el final. Le disparé al último rebelde del grupo que nos atacó. Pero por desgracia... el capitán sucumbió a sus heridas, y los demás ya habían muerto. ¡Que el Emperador los tenga en su gloria!».
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protected me!" {n}the soldier replies with confidence.{/n} "I didn't run, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, if that's what you're thinking! I was by my commander's side until the very end. I shot the last rebel from the gang that attacked us. But alas... the captain succumbed to his wounds, and the others had already died. The Emperor rest their souls!"

traits.locale_text: «¡El {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} me protegió!» {n}responde el soldado con confianza.{/n} «¡No huí, mi{mf|lord|lady}, si eso es lo que está pensando! Estuve junto a mi comandante hasta el final. Le disparé al último rebelde del grupo que nos atacó. Pero por desgracia... el capitán sucumbió a sus heridas, y los demás ya habían muerto. ¡Que el Emperador los tenga en su gloria!».

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} korudu." {n}Asker, öz güvenle cevap veriyor.{/n} "Merak ediyorsanız hayır, kaçmadım {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Sonuna kadar komutanımın yanındaydım. Bize saldıran çetedeki son asiyi de öldürdüm ama ne yazık ki... Yüzbaşı yaralarına yenik düştü, diğerleriyse çoktan ölmüştü. İmparator, ruhlarını şad etsin!"
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protected me!" {n}the soldier replies with confidence.{/n} "I didn't run, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, if that's what you're thinking! I was by my commander's side until the very end. I shot the last rebel from the gang that attacked us. But alas... the captain succumbed to his wounds, and the others had already died. The Emperor rest their souls!"

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} korudu," {n}diye cevap veriyor asker öz güvenle.{/n} "Merak ediyorsanız hayır, kaçmadım {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Sonuna kadar komutanımın yanındaydım. Bize saldıran çetedeki son asiyi de öldürdüm ama ne yazık ki... Yüzbaşı yaralarına yenik düştü, diğerleriyse çoktan ölmüştü. İmparator, ruhlarını şad etsin!"
